properties.entry: SELECT c.cliente,s.sitio,r.consumo,r.fp,ano,mes FROM usrenergyview01.resumen r INNER JOIN sitios s on s.id = r.idsitio INNER JOIN cliente c on c.id = r.idcliente WHERE ano = ? and mes = ?
SELECT s.sitio,avg(avg) as consumo FROM usrenergyview01.dias d INNER JOIN sitios s on s.id = d.idsitio where idvariable = 6 and ano = ? and mes = ? group by 1 order by 1

SELECT tagtimestamp as hora,SUM(h.avg) as consumo from horas h INNER JOIN sitios s on s.id = h.idsitio where idvariable = 2 AND tagtimestamp > timestampadd('hh',-12,NOW()) and s.idsitio = ? group by 1 order by 1

SELECT now() as now, concat(concat(concat('01/',mes::varchar(2)),'/'),ano)::timestamp as inicio, SUM(h.avg) as consumo from horas h INNER JOIN sitios s on s.id = h.idsitio where idvariable = 2 and s.idsitio = ? AND mes = ? and ano = ? group by s.id,ano,mes
SELECT * FROM ext_cognos where idsitio = ? AND componente LIKE 'FASE%' order by 1,2
SELECT distinct nombresitio,nombreequipo,domicilio,codigopostal,zonaregion,gpslatitud,gpslongitud,idequipo FROM EXT_COGNOS where tipoequipo = 'PLANTA DE EMERGENCIA'
